Description.SourceString: You can summon pets to fight at your side during missions. Every time your Heroes attack, it builds the Pet Charge Meters on the bottom right of the screen. Pets cost different amounts of charge, and some pets may be better suited for certain situations. Choose your pet wisely!
Description.LocalizedString: You can summon pets to fight at your side during missions. Every time your Heroes attack, it builds the Pet Charge Meters on the bottom right of the screen. Pets cost different amounts of charge, and some pets may be better suited for certain situations. Choose your pet wisely!
